gtm: Modeling Group Testing Data

Source: R/gtm_package.R
gtm.Rd

The gtm package provides tools for modeling and analyzing group testing data. It includes functions for fitting models, evaluating performance, and visualizing results.

See also

dorfman for details on specific methods.

Author

Maintainer: Muhammad Yaseen myaseen208@gmail.com (ORCID) (School of Mathematical & Statistical Sciences, Clemson University, Clemson, South Carolina, USA)
